text: Mother's Baby Boy is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Eva Bell - Mother Pilkins * Oliver Hardy - Percival Pilkins (as Babe Hardy) * Nellie Farron - Nell Haldane * Don Ferrando - Tom Brown * Burt Bucher - Bill Green * Royal Byron - Sport Regan (as Roy Byron) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: Mother's Baby Boy
